column4: Hello! I wondered if someone knew how to make windows xp run in ubuntu? In Wmvare? Crossover? paralelle? What is best, and what supports directx?
Hello! I wondered if someone knew how to make windows xp run in ubuntu? In Wmvare? Crossover? paralelle? What is best, and what supports directx?
you can only run the OS in a virtualised environment like vmware
so why say things like "cross-over" which won't run the OS only applications, if you already knew it
